column5: Hey everybody. Today I spent the day with my Dad fishing for pike but turned into a fun day catching small bass after another. We caught 9 bass by the end of the few hours we spent fishing all were 1lb or under...maybe a pound in a half but either way they were small. Never saw a pike follow a spinnerbait so it might be a week or two early for them or they are just further out off the shores.  Here are 2 pictures, just random fish no significance. Anyway had a ball fishing all day today in the perfect weather.     Thanks for reading, MTBF
now THATS what its all about....   with the ole man.What a way to pass the thanksgiving weekend. Congrats to both of you and thanks for sharing Mike   Paul
Great report. I have very fond memories of me and my dad fishing. Today was a beautiful day, I should have gone fishing!  :wallbash:
Beautiful. Father son time!  I am a dad, and my kids keep asking me to go fishing. I know I am lucky that they want to come fishing. I hope it stays this way forever.
What I'd do for that Mike! Never fished a day in my life with mine...
Father son duo fishing is the best times Sounds like you guys had fun along the shoreline Thanks for sharing Leechman
ahhh good read on a lazy sunday morning. Thanks
Good going!! Quality time and fishing is bonus:)
Even if this is your dad  He would still be loved.

Thx for sharing that. Time with the old man....priceless.  Next weekend is our annual trip up to Orillia with my brother and father to molest Simcoe perch. Some colorful banter on the water and back at the hotel with a few pops and a good fish fry Saturday night. Wouldn't miss it for anything.
